name: schoolpoll
short_description:
This project in short covers the process of voting/elections electronically. It can serve Opinion Polls as well.

The App is web-based and makes use of the popular php programming language as the parser from the server side, java script and css at the client side and uses MySQL as the back-end database engine.

It keeps record of the number of votes cast and other related information. It can keep track of previous elections held, creates a number of electoral colleges/communities. 

It also has an admin panel which allows an administrator to create/update/delete voters and candidates for elections, generate PIN codes for voters automatically etc. 

It also has a sleek and modern Ajax based dashboard which can be projected or shown on a TV screen for voters to monitor the progress of their favorite candidate. The report display is in real time and shows the number of votes cast and other important stats pertaining to candidates and voters alike.
summary: A web-based Voting Management System for Schools and Colleges.
